howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From first inquiry to full recovery — we handle everything
howItWorks.step1Desc: Fill out a simple form describing your medical needs and preferences.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our medical coordinators match you with the best hospitals and doctors.
howItWorks.step3Desc: We arrange visa, flights, accommodation, and translation — full service.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Post-treatment follow-up with your dedicated coordinator anytime.
